column3:
A: I was surprised Amy wasn't at the meeting. Perhaps she didn't know about it.
B: That's possible. She {{c1::might not}} have known about it.

A: I wonder why they haven't replied to the email. Do you think they received it?
B: Maybe not. They {{c1::might not}} have received it.

A: I wonder how the fire started. Was it an accident?
B: No, the police say it {{c1::couldn't}} have been an accident.

A: Mike says he needs to see you. He tried to find you yesterday.
B: Well, he {{c1::couldn't}} have tried very hard. I was in my office all day.

A: The man you spoke to â€“ are you sure he was American?
B: No, I'm not sure. He {{c1::might not}} have been American.
